data.comment: Bjorn Kuipers starts the match. Heerenveen with the kick-off in Amsterdam.
Goal! Dusan Tadic gives Ajax a 1-0 lead in Amsterdam.
In the minute 4, Mohammed Kudus instrumental with a fine assist.
Ajax have been given a penalty at Johan Cruijff Arena...
Ajax are going well in Amsterdam. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Dusan Tadic penalty.
In the minute 35, Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 3-0 through Mohammed Kudus.
Great play from Ryan Gravenberch to set up the goal.
The first half has been concluded at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 46, It's Ajax with the kick-off after the break.
The away team have replaced Oliver Batista Meier with Benjamin Nygren. This is the first substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
Erik ten Hag is making the team's first substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Antony Santos replacing Dusan Tadic.
In the minute 61, Sean Klaiber is replacing Noussair Mazraoui for the home team.
Goal! Henk Veerman pulls one back to make it 3-1.
Mitchell Van Bergen with an assist there.
In the minute 72, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Ajax.
Davy Klaassen gives Ajax a 4-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Rodney Kongolo (Heerenveen) has received a yellow card from Bjorn Kuipers.
In the minute 74, Jan Paul van Hecke (Heerenveen) has received a first yellow card.
Quincy Promes is replacing David Neres for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a second substitution, with Sieben Dewaele replacing Rodney Kongolo.
In the minute 82, Lisandro Martinez is on a sub for Daley Blind for Ajax.
The home team replace Lassina Franck Traore with Klaas-Jan Huntelaar.
Lisandro Martinez for Ajax has been booked by Bjorn Kuipers and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 5-1 through Antony Santos.
That's a fine assist from Mohammed Kudus.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 5-1.
